title: Crisanta Knight: Inherent Fate
description: Separated from their friends, Daniel and Crisanta have to work together to traverse the kingdom of Alderon and evade the antagonists who are trying to destroy them. Moreover, they must do so while figuring out whether or not they can truly be friends. With their mission drawing to a close, Crisanta's magical powers are about to be revealed. But among these great truths, she is about to discover a strength that will be infinitely more powerful.
author: Geanna Culbertson
